item.description:
Hey everyone,

Let's do some Tuesday night climbing. The climbing is good for the body and the great company is good for the spirit. So, this Tuesday, turn off the TV and hit MetroRock instead.

Please note, you will need to pass a belay test if you are an experienced climber but new to the gym. You'll want to take a class at Metrorock if you have never climbed before. Please call the gym in advance to make arrangements.

Metrorock will charge you $16 for a daypass if you are not already a member or a punch card holder. For more information see:

http://www.metrorock....

If you don't have a car, MetroRock has a shuttle to the gym from the T - Wellington Station (Orange Line).

See you there!

Kevin
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wait at the picnic table until 7:40; after that, you'll find me climbing.
item.name: Tuesday night climbing at MetroRock
